Pointer Index¶

class Pointer(pointerName, pointeeReference, linkedNodePosition)¶

Class to represent any pointer that will be used in the visualizations

constructor to initialize a pointer to a linked list node

Arguments:
  • pointerName (String) – pointer name
  • pointeeReference (reference) – the reference for pointee node
  • linkedNodePosition (reference) – pointee position
Pointer.equals(OtherPointer)¶

checks if the current pointer is equal to the other pointer

Arguments:
  • OtherPointer (Pointer) – the other pointer that will be compared to the current pointer
Pointer.getName()¶

get pointer name

Pointer.getPointeePosition()¶

get the linked list node pointee index

Pointer.getPointeeReference()¶

get the pointer memory reference value

Pointer.setName(value)¶

set pointer name

Arguments:
  • value (String) – pointer name value
Pointer.setPointeePosition(value)¶

set the linked list node pointee index

Arguments:
  • value (Integer) – the linked list node pointee index
Pointer.setPointeeReference(value)¶

set the pointer memory reference value

Arguments:
  • value (reference) – pointer memory reference value
